title: I Don’T Want To Die, So I’M Going To Raise A Hero
alternative_title: 死にたくないので英雄様を育てる事に します
status: 死にたくないので英雄様を育てる事に します
description:
Description :
        A university student named Osaka Nao reincarnates as the villainous young master Lian in a game. He is tasked with raising the future hero Alfred into a capable man and making him fulfill his mission to save the world.Despite Lian's efforts to be disliked, it has no effect In fact, Alfred seems to like him!?While Lian grows increasingly anxious, Alfred keeps getting closer and closer!?"Hey, is it okay if I touch you more?"The unrefined hero's unconscious pampering makes Lian's heart raceunavoidable heart-throbbing moments.
